item.description: To celebrate the release of Pathfinder's new Beginner's Box Toys will be holding Pathfinder sessions starting at 1PM Saturday Oct 29th. Each session features scenarios from the new Beginner's Box and scenarios written by Paizo for the event. Sessions run for roughly an hour each and begin at 1PM, 3PM,and 5PM. I'll update the event listing with scenario info once it comes available.

group.name: The Boston Dungeons & Dragons Meetup Group

item.name: Toys Beginner Box Bash Oct 29th
